alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:03PM CDT until May 04 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Foard County in northern Texas... Southwestern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 803 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Swearingen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Foard and southwestern Hardeman Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
